description: This dataset visualizes the summarized distribution of Donor and GOK funded Projects across the Country. Together with the location information on projects the dataset contains descriptive information about the project, the total financial estimates and the average estimated costs per year based on the duration of the project. Some Usage notes: Due to the limited detail of financial data do not calculate totals or add any fields together.

name: 2013 - 2015 List of Government project locations and the Donors who fund them.  (Sourced from the E-ProMIS Portal)
